column3: Dwarf]] and the father of [[Farin (video game character)
column4: Farin]]. When Farin was born he did live in the [[Iron Hills]]. It is unknown if he was originally born in [[Lonely Mountain
column5: Erebor]], or if he returned after the [[Battle of the Five Armies]]. Although he doesn't make an actual appearance in [[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]], he is mentioned in the [http://www.warinthenorth.com/the-game/heroes/backstory#dwarfAnchor backstory of Farin].<ref name="Backstory Farin"/>
